message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it! Would you like to make an offer to buy it from me for $12000?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I appreciate your generosity. However, I am only able to offer $9500 for the product at this time.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Hello Alice, I've considered your offer and I'm willing to go up to $10500 for the product. Is this within your range?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I'm still a bit above that price. How about we meet at $11500?
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I'm not able to go beyond $11000 for the product. Could we meet somewhere in between?
